sourceMeaningMnemonic: Below the <radical>canopy</radical> of <radical>tree</radical>s is a <radical>demon</radical>. This demon is a <kanji>devil</kanji>.
meaningInfo: You thought the devil hangs out in hell, but he actually hangs out under this canopy of trees.
readingMnemonic: Why is the <kanji>devil</kanji> under a canopy of trees? Because he's looking for his <reading>ma</reading>ma (<ja>ま</ja>).
readingInfo: Into the trees is where all mamas go missing. And so the devil searches for his mama under this canopy of trees.
